argumentsAndDecisions.complaintSummary: Security concerns due to main gate being left open
argumentsAndDecisions.evidenceAssessment: Board found security was compromised by gate being left open for parking convenience
argumentsAndDecisions.impactAssessment: Non-residents were able to enter property, creating security risk

argumentsAndDecisions.respondentHadNotice: Yes, respondent had water tested by vendor
argumentsAndDecisions.evidenceAssessment: Vendor found water was safe to drink, issue was from water supplier
argumentsAndDecisions.impactAssessment: No impact found as water was determined to be safe
